name: Street Outreach Services (SOS)
description: Street Outreach Services (SOS) is a traveling medical van to sites throughout SF, the SOS team of doctors, nurses, outreach workers, and volunteers arrive straight to your location - soup kitchens, on city streets, under freeway passes, and in parks. • On-site preventive and urgent health care • Connection to a medical home (a doctor or nurse practitioner and clinic) for long-term primary care • Linkage to other needed resources, e.g., mental health, substance recovery, dental services, legal su
fullDescription: Street Outreach Services (SOS) is a traveling medical van to sites throughout SF, the SOS team of doctors, nurses, outreach workers, and volunteers arrive straight to your location - soup kitchens, on city streets, under freeway passes, and in parks. • On-site preventive and urgent health care • Connection to a medical home (a doctor or nurse practitioner and clinic) for long-term primary care • Linkage to other needed resources, e.g., mental health, substance recovery, dental services, legal su
whatTheyOffer: Street Outreach Services (SOS) is a traveling medical van to sites throughout SF, the SOS team of doctors, nurses, outreach workers, and volunteers arrive straight to your location - soup kitchens, on city streets, under freeway passes, and in parks. • On-site preventive and urgent health care • Connection to a medical home (a doctor or nurse practitioner and clinic) for long-term primary care • Linkage to other needed resources, e.g., mental health, substance recovery, dental services, legal su
howToGetIt: There is no application process. Just show up to the location where the van will be. For van/clinic schedule, please go to the website or call the main number.
